summary: I have this playlist on my phone purely because as much as I love Harry’s more loud/ rock and roll stuff sometimes I don’t need...
body: I have this playlist on my phone purely because as much as I love Harry’s more loud/ rock and roll stuff sometimes I don’t need to be startled away by Kiwi at 12:30 at night with it blasting through my headphones I forgot to take out

blog.description: Writing fiction | MASTERLIST |  My main blog is: @readerastronaut & Comments, likes and follows come from there ❤

summary: Sidekick of a Superstar - Chapter 53 Indianapolis
title: Sidekick of a Superstar - Chapter 53 Indianapolis
body:
Here’s the next chapter. Hope you will like it! :)

Word count: 1.1k

Lookbook

Indianapolis look

Series Masterpost

MAIN MASTERLIST

You spent the morning and the travelling to Indianapolis with Lottie, mostly you had snacks and you were working on your tablet. Lottie spoke up after a while.

“You know, I don’t understand one thing.”

“What?” you asked not looking up from the screen.

“You thought there could be something between Harry and Kacey, even though she has a husband,” she said.

“She has what?” you looked up.

“Don’t say you didn’t know that!”

“I… did not know that,” you said.

“Are you joking? I’ve seen her husband twice already and I’m here for a few days only.”

“I don’t know a lot of things…”

“I can see that. You should’ve google her before you think she’s hitting on Harry. I talked to her yesterday. She’s very sorry that you and Harry are not going well. She was rooting for you two. She’s a lovely woman,” she finished and got back to her book. You were deep in thoughts. How did you not realize the obvious facts? Why do you know so little about your co-workers? But you knew the answer.

“I think, it’s because you’re so focused on Harry. Of course, it’s your job, but I think you were so up high in his arse, that you didn’t realize others,” Lottie interrupted your thoughts.

“How did you know what I’m thinking about?”

“I’m your best friend. And sorry for being too harsh, but I think you need an opinion that’s from outside of your situation.”

She was right. You needed to see it from outside. You’ve been deep, but your thoughts might find their ways to the right place now. For the first time, you felt you’re going forward and not just stepping in one place.

It was a concert night so you got right to the venue when you arrived. You had to finish some works with Jeff. When you did, you decided to go through the stage because it’s a shorter way to your dressing room. You were surprised to see all the band members and Louis and Lottie on stage. Sarah sat by the drums, Clare sat by the piano, Adam and Mitch stood by the guitar stands with Lottie and Louis.

“Hey! Y/N is here,” Clare said.

“What are you all doing here?” you asked.

“Just talking, waiting for soundcheck to start,” Louis said.

“Come and join us,” Lottie said and reached her arm for you. You put her into a side hug and joined the conversation. You were talking about the concert for a few minutes when Louis did something.

“Excuse me,” he kissed Lottie on her cheek and went to Clare. He mumbled something and Clare stood up and Louis sat down. He started playing a song that you recognized right away.

“Step one, you say we need to talk

He walks, you say sit down, it’s just a talk

He smiles politely back at you

You stare politely right on through” Louis sang and Sarah joined with drumming. Lottie handed you a mic.

“If you wanna sing,” she smiled and you took the mic.

“Some sort of window to your right

As he goes left, and you stay right

Between the lines of fear and blame

You begin to wonder why you came”

They stopped playing. Everyone looked at you. You started singing the chorus and the played on.

“Where did I go wrong?

I lost a friend

Somewhere along in the bitterness” You saw Harry enter the stage from the side. He walked slowly, he didn’t want to interrupt. You looked into his eyes.

“And I would have stayed up with you all night

Had I known how to save a life”

You couldn’t have sang because your voice cracked. Louis sang the song after you.

“Let him know that you know best

Cause after all, you do know best

Try to slip past his defense

Without granting innocence

Lay down a list of what is wrong

The things you’ve told him all along

And pray to God he hears you

And I pray to God he hears you”

Harry approached slowly and grabbed a mic on the way. He looked at you constantly. You let him sing the chorus.

“Where did I go wrong?

I lost a friend

Somewhere along in the bitterness

And I would have stayed up with you all night

Had I known how to save a life”

They skipped a verse and finished the song. You wanted to walk away, Louis stopped you.

“I think you two should talk, because you love each other and it’s hard to watch that both of you suffer.”

You didn’t reply, but looked at Harry and walked away. You heard them having soundcheck and Lottie walked in.

“Hey! Louis didn’t want to offend you,” she said.

“It’s okay. He’s right,” you answered, while organizing papers. “But I’m busy right now, we have to talk when we have plenty of time and we are relaxed.”

“You mean never?”

“No, I mean, not on a concert night,” you said.

“We’ll have two days off,” Lottie winked.

“I know.”

A little later Helene asked you to get dressed so she can take the photos with Harry. You put on the pants and the shirt. You entered Harry’s dressing room and his face lit up when he saw you.

“You look amazing,” he said.

“Thank you! You look great too,” you smiled.

“Okay, smiles please,” Helene asked and Harry gently touched your waist while standing next to you. You looked up at him and Helene took another photo. Harry excused himself and gathered the band to go on stage. 

You heard the start of Only Angel and went back to see Jeff. This night Lottie and Louis were out together in a VIP part of the venue. You wandered around the building, but you felt you needed some fresh air, so you went outside on a back door. You were surprised to see Kacey there alone.

“Sorry! I didn’t want to interrupt,” you said and tried to go back.

“No! Please, stay!” she said.

“Why are you here? Are you okay?” you asked.

“Yes, but sometimes I need to cool down after a concert. I needed some fresh air.”

“I needed some fresh air too.”

“Look, I know it’s none of my business, but I know that Harry and you are having a little break now. I just want to say that he’s a rare guy, just like my Ruston. And you are an amazing woman. He loves you and I dare to say that you love him too. You’re young but don’t waste the time,” she advised.

“Thank you, Kacey. And I’m sorry!”

“For what?”

“I thought you’re a terrible person, before I even knew you. I’m an idiot and I wanted to apologize for that.”

“We all make mistakes, but you realized it and apologized.” she smiled at you. You went closer and hugged her.

“Thank you!”

You went back and waited for the show to end. Next day you had a trip to Chicago.

“Sorry! I didn’t want to interrupt,” you said and tried to go back.

“No! Please, stay!” she said.

“Why are you here? Are you okay?” you asked.

“I know.”

“Thank you! You look great too,” you smiled.

You heard the start of Only Angel and went back to see Jeff. This night Lottie and Louis were out together in a VIP part of the venue. You wandered around the building, but you felt you needed some fresh air, so you went outside on a back door. You were surprised to see Kacey there alone.

“Sorry! I didn’t want to interrupt,” you said and tried to go back.

“No! Please, stay!” she said.

“Why are you here? Are you okay?” you asked.

“Yes, but sometimes I need to cool down after a concert. I needed some fresh air.”

“I needed some fresh air too.”

“Look, I know it’s none of my business, but I know that Harry and you are having a little break now. I just want to say that he’s a rare guy, just like my Ruston. And you are an amazing woman. He loves you and I dare to say that you love him too. You’re young but don’t waste the time,” she advised.

“I thought you’re a terrible person, before I even knew you. I’m an idiot and I wanted to apologize for that.”

“Thank you!”

blog.title: s a t i v a
blog.description:
harry writings!

l e m o n a d e

summary:
Okay so i have these ideas popped in my head, have the concepts ready and everything:
1. Y/n is a street car racer and harry is...
body:
Okay so i have these ideas popped in my head, have the concepts ready and everything:

1. Y/n is a street car racer and harry is a college student

2. Y/n has an abusive husband and harry tries to help

3. Y/n is a 19 year old college student and harry is a 29 year old porn director

4. You two are best friends and his girlfriend does something mean to you


Choose one! And I’ll write it after i post i should’ve walked away pt. 2!

1. Y/n is a street car racer and harry is a college student

2. Y/n has an abusive husband and harry tries to help

3. Y/n is a 19 year old college student and harry is a 29 year old porn director

4. You two are best friends and his girlfriend does something mean to you


Choose one! And I’ll write it after i post i should’ve walked away pt. 2!

summary: 4.	“Is that my shirt?” & 46.	“I’m in love…shit” Harryyy
question: 4.	“Is that my shirt?” & 46.	“I’m in love…shit” Harryyy
answer:
My new story, I Design Dreams insipred this. Thank you for requesting! I hope you like it! :)

4. “Is that my shirt?”

46. “I’m in love…shit”

You worked as a fashion designer and you were about to launch your first collection. You worked very hard and spent most of your days in the studio sewing and managing your workers. Sometimes, your boyfriend came in because he missed you. But no one, including him could see your collection until the release. One day you were alone late at night in the studio. You knew you’re gonna stay a few hours more, so you went out to the supermarket while it was still open. Harry had a key and he decided to surprise you.

“Hello! It’s me, he said when he got in. “Where are you?” he thought you’re in there because you left some light on. He went around to find you. He didn’t find you, but he found a room that was totally dark. He switched the light on. There it was, your new collection. He went in and looked around. He admired the clothes that were ready to wear.

“You’re a genius. I’m in love…shit,” he mumbled.

You got back ten minutes later and saw that more lights are on. You picked up a heavy thing and slowly approached the little wardrobe where your collection was. You screamed and jumped when Harry walked out.

“Damn it, you scared me,” you shouted.

“Sorry, so sorry, love, I didn’t mean to…”

“Is that my shirt?”

“I…uh”

“Harry, you weren’t supposed to see that. And you’re wearing my shirt,” you said.

“Sorry, I’ll take it off,” he said and started unbuttoning it. “Here you are,” he said and handed it to you. He stood there half naked.

“Thank you,” you grabbed it. “It’s actually designed for women.”

“I love it.”
